LanguageData.DMS_ExtractCompFromSlag.label: disassemble from automatroid debris
LanguageData.DMS_ExtractCompFromSlag.description: Disassemble automatroid debris to extract useful component.
LanguageData.DMS_ExtractMetalFromSlag.label: smelt metal from automatroid debris
LanguageData.DMS_ExtractMetalFromSlag.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from automatroid debris.
